snippet: Musicians of the New York Youth Symphony played the work of a young composer, and others, at Carnegie Hall on Sunday.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by the New York Youth Symphony, playing the premiere of That Blue Repair, a mini-concerto by young composer Chris Rogerson.
lead_paragraph: Musicians of the New York Youth Symphony played the work of a young composer, and others, at Carnegie Hall on Sunday.

headline.seo: New York Youth Symphony at Carnegie Hall
headline.main: Premiere for Cello and Orchestra, Inspired by a Poem
headline.print_headline: Premiere for Cello and Orchestra, Inspired by a Poem
